description: From 2021, women will no longer have to ask their husbands for permission to deal with tax matters
title: Jersey reforms tax affairs to grant 'equal rights' to all
title_page: Jersey reforms tax affairs to grant 'equal rights' to all - BBC News
maintext: Jersey's Treasury and Exchequer found the changes could lead to a net figure of around 5,000 couples paying more tax than they would have, if a staggered approach was not taken.
